description: Redevelopment of the former Coop Site to provide two retail units (totalling 2,120sq.m), a gym (1,871sq.m.) and 98 residential units to be operated within the private rented sector, all with ancillary space, within a 2-11 storey mixed use development together with disabled parking spaces, delivery bay, servicing, cycle parking, landscaping and other works.  This application site is partially located within the East Ham Civic Centre Conservation Area This application is affecting the setting of the East Ham Civic Centre Conservation Area This application is affecting the setting of Listed Buildings East Ham Town Hall Grade II* Denmark Arms Grade II East Ham Public Library Grade II Council Offices Former Fire Station Grade II Technical College Grade II Wall to East Ham Town Hall Grade II Police Station with walls and gatepiers Grade II Fellowship House Grade II
